heading: up in smoke
subheading: several decades and millions of deaths later, the philip morris co. is finally conceding what everybody else has known for years: smoking ain't good for ya. the nation's largest cigarette maker, which has steadfastly denied scientific claims that smoking causes cancer and other life-threatening diseases, officially gave up the charade wednesday with the debut of its new web site. there, for the first time, philip morris conceded that its products can kill you. amazing what the threat of endless, costly litigation can do for a company, isn't it?
author: wired staff
